class.name: GLTFSkin
class.brief_description: GLTFSkin represents a skin in an FBX file.
class.description: The GLTFSkin class handles skin data imported from FBX files. It includes methods for getting and setting inverse binds, joint indices to bone indices, joint indices to names, and properties for joints, roots, and skins.

method.name: get_inverse_binds
method.description: Gets an array of Transform3D objects representing the inverse binds [Transform3D].

method.name: get_joint_i_to_bone_i
method.description: Gets a dictionary mapping joint indices to bone indices.

method.name: get_joint_i_to_name
method.description: Gets a dictionary mapping joint indices to their names.

method.name: set_inverse_binds
method.description: Sets the inverse binds with the given array of [Transform3D] objects.

method.name: set_joint_i_to_bone_i
method.description: Sets the mapping of joint indices to bone indices with the given dictionary.

method.name: set_joint_i_to_name
method.description: Sets the mapping of joint indices to their names with the given dictionary.
